snippet: Lining up next to the drag-racing legend John Force can be intimidating for any rookie. But not for Courtney Force, who became a contender to win the national title that her 63-year-old father has won 15 times.
abstract: Profile of rookie funny car driver Courtney Force, daughter of drag-racing legend John Force; Courtney is in contention to win national title that her father has won 15 times.
lead_paragraph: Lining up next to the drag-racing legend John Force can be intimidating for any rookie. But not for Courtney Force, who became a contender to win the national title that her 63-year-old father has won 15 times.

headline.seo: Courtney Force’s Need for Speed is Inherited From Her Father
headline.main: Rookie’s Need for Speed Is Inherited From Father
headline.print_headline: Rookie’s Need for Speed Is Inherited From Father
